00022 public class Login extends AbstractAction
00023 {
00027         public Login()
00028         {
00029                 super(new User()); // Travaille avec des users
00030                 setDetailedDescription("Vous connecter");
00031         }
00032 
00033         public AbstractEntity doAction(AbstractEntity entity,
00034                         Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00035         {
00036                 String currentLoginName = parameters.get("name");
00037                 if (currentLoginName == null)
00038                         currentLoginName = "";
00039 
00040                 Form loginForm = new Form(new UserRightModule(), new Login());
00041                 loginForm.addField("Utilisateur", "name", currentLoginName);
00042                 Field<?> tmpPwd = new User().getFields().getField("password");
00043                 tmpPwd.setDefaultValue();
00044                 loginForm.addField(tmpPwd);
00045                 loginForm.setTitle("Identification");
00046                 loginForm.setButtonAction(new ActionLink("Entrer", this));
00047 
00048                 if (parameters.containsKey("submit"))
00049                 {
00050                         Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> userList = ((AbstractOrmEntity) (entity))
00051                                         .get((AbstractOrmEntity) (entity));
00052 
00053                         if (userList.size() > 0 && userList.get(0).getData("name") != null)
00054                         {
00055                                 if (IsGroupValid((User) (userList.get(0))))
00056                                 {
00057                                         Authentication.setCurrentUserName(entity
00058                                                         .getDataString("name"));
00059                                         return new StaticTextEntity("Bienvenue "
00060                                                         + userList.get(0).getData("name"));
00061                                 }
00062 
00063                                 loginForm.addAlertMessage("Groupe invalide ou corrompu");
00064                         }
00065                         loginForm.addAlertMessage("Nom ou mot de passe invalide");
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 return loginForm;
00069         }
00070 
00071         private boolean IsGroupValid(User user)
00072         {
00073                 AbstractOrmEntity groups;
00074                 try
00075                 {
00076                         groups = user.getGroupsEntity();
00077                 } catch (Exception e)
00078                 {
00079                         return false;
00080                 }
00081                 if (groups == null)
00082                         return false;
00083                 return true;
00084         }
00085 }
